item.title: 100個のセルを動的に作成する #12
item.description: <html> <head> <style> .container { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; width: 500px; text-align: center; } .cell { width: 23px; height: 23px; border: 1px solid black; } .salmon { background-color: salmon; } </style> </head> <body> <div id="container" class="container"></div> <script> window.onload = function() { var container = document.getElementById('container'); var coloredCells = [4, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 33, 88]; for (var i = 0; i <= 99; i++) { var cell = document.createElement('div'); cell.
